title: RaycastResult

name: RaycastResult
type: datatype
summary: |
  Stores results from a raycast operation.
description: |
  The Datatype.RaycastResult data type stores the result of a successful
  raycasting operation performed by Class.WorldRoot:Raycast(). It contains the
  properties listed below.

  This object should not be confused with the similarly-named
  Datatype.RaycastParams which is used to perform a raycast.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
constructors: []
constants: []
properties:
  - name: RaycastResult.Distance
    type: number
    summary: |
      The distance between the ray origin and the intersection point.
    description: |
      The distance between the ray origin and the intersection point.
    default:
    codesamples: []
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: RaycastResult.Instance
    type: BasePart
    summary: |
      The Class.BasePart or Class.Terrain cell that the ray intersected.
    description: |
      The Class.BasePart or Class.Terrain cell that the ray intersected.
    default:
    codesamples: []
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: RaycastResult.Material
    type: Material
    summary: |
      The Enum.Material at the intersection point.
    description: |
      The Enum.Material at the intersection point. For normal parts this is
      the Class.BasePart.Material; for Class.Terrain this can vary depending
      on terrain data.
    default:
    codesamples: []
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: RaycastResult.Position
    type: Vector3
    summary: |
      The world space point at which the intersection occurred.
    description: |
      The world space point at which the intersection occurred, usually a point
      directly on the surface of the Class.BasePart or Class.Terrain cell.
    default:
    codesamples: []
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: RaycastResult.Normal
    type: Vector3
    summary: |
      The normal vector of the intersected face.
    description: |
      The normal vector of the intersected face.
    default:
    codesamples: []
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
